title: Terms may be changed at their discretion, but they will notify you before.

tosdr.case: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms at their discretion, but they will notify the user in reasonable advance by email or by posting them online. However, your use of the service constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms without explicit consent.
